Package com.joliciel.talismane

Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotationObserver
    For getting notified whenever annotations are added.
    Annotator<T extends AnnotatedText>
    Implemented by classes which take an annotated text and add zero or more annotations.
    LinguisticRules
    Various generic rules for a given language, indicating via heuristics how to handle different situations.
    NeedsTalismaneSession
    An object which needs a Talismane session assigned to it.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedText
    Text with related annotations, and observers when annotations are added.
    Annotation<T extends java.io.Serializable>
    Annotation added to a continuous span of text.
    GenericRules  
    Talismane
    A class for processing a stream of data using a reader via Talismane.analyse(Reader), and creating various outputs, with formats as defined by the configuration, with their location specified in the constructor.

    The processing will go from Talismane.getStartModule() to Talismane.getEndModule().
    TalismaneMain
    Direct entry point for Talismane from the command line.
    TalismaneServer
    A Talismane server, for loading all resources up front and processing sentences received on the fly.
    TalismaneSession
    A class storing session-wide reference data and objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Talismane.BuiltInTemplate
    How to output the Talismane analysis
    Talismane.Command
    The command which Talismane is asked to perform.
    Talismane.Mode  
    Talismane.Module
    A module within the Talismane Suite.
    Talismane.ProcessingOption  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TalismaneException  

Package com.joliciel.talismane Description

Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
